title: Small-Group Collaborative Learning for Enhancing Medical Communication Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic medical terminology and general conversational skills
context.additional_context: Blended learning combining online discussions and offline role-playing in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply empathetic questioning techniques with 80% accuracy through patient-doctor scenario-based role-playing
Communication strategies can be revised at least twice based on peer feedback in small-group discussions
Communication confidence levels can be improved by at least two stages through peer and self-assessment on online platforms
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
